Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
BLAKISTS SEIZE TITAN NAVAL YARDS!


Titan, Sol System: Although [[DM.Factions[faction_WordOfBlake],Word of Blake]] forces conquered Terra in 3058, the cradle of humanity was far from the only occupied world in Sol System. Even as Mars and Venus fell to the Blakists, many facilities and outposts within Sol System remained, at least nominally, in the hands of [[DM.Factions[faction_ComStar],ComStar]] proper. The last of these fell on 17 January, as Precentor Klaus Hettig formally joined the [[DM.Factions[faction_WordOfBlake],Word of Blake]], bringing with him the unparalleled manufacturing capabilities of the Titan Naval Yards.


Please stay tuned for a word from our sponsor.

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
Pharaoh beer: Keep Your Tracks TightÂ©


Lovingly brewed for over 500 years, Pharaoh beer is the beverage of choice for today's working man. Let the nobility have their snooty [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCholobara],cholobara]] with [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKincha],kincha]] toast. From farmers to miners, tankers to grunts, Pharaoh beer gets you where you're going.



Pharaoh Beverage Co. is not responsible for any injuries or damages sustained while consuming this beverage. Please drink however the hell you want.
